page.title: 02SLEAFORD SWIMMING POOL
page.content:
SLEAFORD SWIMMING POOL IS SITUATED ON THE EAST SIDE OF THE TOWN NEAR THE RIVER SLEA.IT WAS OPENED ABOUT IN 1900.IT ORIGINALLY CONSISTED OF 1 LARGE UNHEATED OPEN AIR POOL.THIS REMAINED SO UNTIL 1960 WHEN A SHALLOW POOL WAS OPENED FOR YOUNG CHILDREN.THE MAIN POOL WAS HEATED IN 1972. IN JANUARY ,1984 WORK BEGAN ON COVERING THE MAIN POOL THE COST WAS OVER Â£400,000 AND THE INDOOR POOL WAS OPENED ON THE 9th OF JUNE,1984. THE WATER IN THE INDOOR POOL IS RE_CYCLED EVERY 3 HOURS AND EVERY 1 HOUR IN THE OUTDOOR POOL EVERY 2 YEARS THE WATER IS EMPTIED AND A NEW SUPPLY IS PUT IN THE POOLS. THE INDOOR POOL IS OPEN ALL THE YEAR 7 DAYS A WEEK.
{BY HELEN JOHNSON (AGE 13)
